text: Pop star Britney Spears' boyfriend, trainer Sam Asghari , has opened up about her fitness regime."(Britney) is a natural born athlete, so the info she has about working out combined with what I know about fitness, is what you see when we collaborate on new moves that we do together," Sam told eonline.com.Also Read:? Sylvester Stallone shows off his salt and pepper look"It looks great on camera, but the moves are much harder in person than they look."Sam revealed they love to workout together. "We run, we do a lot of yoga, we really challenge ourselves to do different types of exercises," Sam said."A lot of the yoga moves that she does I just can't do. She is a natural born athlete and she pushes herself, combining dancing along with various workouts. You just can't plateau when you're in shape. You really need to challenge
title: Sam Asghari
